00045 namespace luabind

00047         namespace detail

00050                 // if the proxy_function_caller returns non-void
00051                         template<class Ret, class Tuple>
00052                         class proxy_function_caller
00053                         {
00054 //                      friend class luabind::object;
00055                         public:
00056 
00057                                 typedef int(*function_t)(lua_State*, int, int);
00058 
00059                                 proxy_function_caller(
00060                                         lua_State* L
00061                                         , int params
00062                                         , function_t fun
00063                                         , const Tuple args)
00064                                         : m_state(L)
00065                                         , m_params(params)
00066                                         , m_fun(fun)
00067                                         , m_args(args)
00068                                         , m_called(false)
00069                                 {
00070                                 }
00071 
00072                                 proxy_function_caller(const proxy_function_caller& rhs)
00073                                         : m_state(rhs.m_state)
00074                                         , m_params(rhs.m_params)
00075                                         , m_fun(rhs.m_fun)
00076                                         , m_args(rhs.m_args)
00077                                         , m_called(rhs.m_called)
00078                                 {
00079                                         rhs.m_called = true;
00080                                 }
00081 
00082                                 ~proxy_function_caller()
00083                                 {
00084                                         if (m_called) return;
00085 
00086                                         m_called = true;
00087                                         lua_State* L = m_state;
00088 
00089                                         int top = lua_gettop(L);
00090 
00091                                         push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args);
00092                                         if (m_fun(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value, 0))
00093                                         {
00094                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top - m_params + 1);
00095 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00096                                                 throw luabind::error(L);
00097 #else
00098                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00099                                                 if (e) e(L);
00100 
00101                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00102                                                                         " If you want to handle the error you can use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00103                                                 std::terminate();
00104 
00105 #endif
00106                                         }
00107 
00108                                         // pops the return values from the function call
00109                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top + m_params);
00110                                 }
00111 
00112                                 operator Ret()
00113                                 {
00114                                         typename mpl::apply_wrap2<default_policy,Ret,lua_to_cpp>::type converter;
00115 
00116                                         m_called = true;
00117                                         lua_State* L = m_state;
00118 
00119                                         int top = lua_gettop(L);
00120 
00121                                         push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args);
00122                                         if (m_fun(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value, 1))
00123                                         {
00124                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top - m_params + 1);
00125 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00126                                                 throw luabind::error(L); 
00127 #else
00128                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00129                                                 if (e) e(L);
00130         
00131                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00132                                                                 " If you want to handle the error you can use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00133                                                 std::terminate();
00134 #endif
00135                                         }
00136 
00137                                         // pops the return values from the function call
00138                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top + m_params);
00139 
00140 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_ERROR_CHECKING
00141 
00142                                         if (converter.match(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(Ret), -1) < 0)
00143                                         {
00144 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00145                                                 throw cast_failed(L, typeid(Ret));
00146 #else
00147                                                 cast_failed_callback_fun e = get_cast_failed_callback();
00148                                                 if (e) e(L, typeid(Ret));
00149 
00150                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function's return value could not be converted."
00151                                                                         " If you want to handle the error you can use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00152                                                 std::terminate();
00153 
00154 #endif
00155                                         }
00156 #endif
00157                                         return converter.apply(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(Ret), -1);
00158                                 }
00159 
00160                                 template<class Policies>
00161                                 Ret operator[](const Policies& p)
00162                                 {
00163                                         typedef typename detail::find_conversion_policy<0, Policies>::type converter_policy;
00164                                         typename mpl::apply_wrap2<converter_policy,Ret,lua_to_cpp>::type converter;
00165 
00166                                         m_called = true;
00167                                         lua_State* L = m_state;
00168 
00169                                         int top = lua_gettop(L);
00170 
00171                                         detail::push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args, p);
00172                                         if (m_fun(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value, 1))
00173                                         { 
00174                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top - m_params + 1);
00175 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00176                                                 throw error(L);
00177 #else
00178                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00179                                                 if (e) e(L);
00180         
00181                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00182                                                                 " If you want to handle the error you can use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00183                                                 std::terminate();
00184 #endif
00185                                         }
00186 
00187                                         // pops the return values from the function call
00188                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top + m_params);
00189 
00190 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_ERROR_CHECKING
00191 
00192                                         if (converter.match(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(Ret), -1) < 0)
00193                                         {
00194 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00195                                                 throw cast_failed(L, typeid(Ret));
00196 #else
00197                                                 cast_failed_callback_fun e = get_cast_failed_callback();
00198                                                 if (e) e(L, typeid(Ret));
00199 
00200                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function's return value could not be converted."
00201                                                                         " If you want to handle the error you can use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00202                                                 std::terminate();
00203 
00204 #endif
00205                                         }
00206 #endif
00207                                         return converter.apply(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(Ret), -1);
00208                                 }
00209 
00210                         private:
00211 
00212                                 lua_State* m_state;
00213                                 int m_params;
00214                                 function_t m_fun;
00215                                 Tuple m_args;
00216                                 mutable bool m_called;
00217 
00218                         };

00220                 // if the proxy_member_caller returns void
00221                         template<class Tuple>
00222                         class proxy_function_void_caller
00223                         {
00224                         friend class luabind::object;
00225                         public:
00226 
00227                                 typedef int(*function_t)(lua_State*, int, int);
00228 
00229                                 proxy_function_void_caller(
00230                                         lua_State* L
00231                                         , int params
00232                                         , function_t fun
00233                                         , const Tuple args)
00234                                         : m_state(L)
00235                                         , m_params(params)
00236                                         , m_fun(fun)
00237                                         , m_args(args)
00238                                         , m_called(false)
00239                                 {
00240                                 }
00241 
00242                                 proxy_function_void_caller(const proxy_function_void_caller& rhs)
00243                                         : m_state(rhs.m_state)
00244                                         , m_params(rhs.m_params)
00245                                         , m_fun(rhs.m_fun)
00246                                         , m_args(rhs.m_args)
00247                                         , m_called(rhs.m_called)
00248                                 {
00249                                         rhs.m_called = true;
00250                                 }
00251 
00252                                 ~proxy_function_void_caller()
00253                                 {
00254                                         if (m_called) return;
00255 
00256                                         m_called = true;
00257                                         lua_State* L = m_state;
00258 
00259                                         int top = lua_gettop(L);
00260 
00261                                         push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args);
00262                                         if (m_fun(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value, 0))
00263                                         {
00264                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top - m_params + 1);
00265 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00266                                                 throw luabind::error(L);
00267 #else
00268                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00269                                                 if (e) e(L);
00270         
00271                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00272                                                                 " If you want to handle the error you can use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00273                                                 std::terminate();
00274 #endif
00275                                         }
00276                                         // pops the return values from the function call
00277                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top + m_params);
00278                                 }
00279 
00280                                 template<class Policies>
00281                                 void operator[](const Policies& p)
00282                                 {
00283                                         m_called = true;
00284                                         lua_State* L = m_state;
00285 
00286                                         int top = lua_gettop(L);
00287 
00288                                         detail::push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args, p);
00289                                         if (m_fun(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value, 0))
00290                                         {
00291                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top - m_params + 1);
00292 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00293                                                 throw error(L);
00294 #else
00295                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00296                                                 if (e) e(L);
00297         
00298                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00299                                                         " If you want to handle the error you can use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00300                                                 std::terminate();
00301 #endif
00302                                         }
00303                                         // pops the return values from the function call
00304                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top + m_params);
00305                                 }
00306 
00307                         private:
00308 
00309                                 lua_State* m_state;
00310                                 int m_params;
00311                                 function_t m_fun;
00312                                 Tuple m_args;
00313                                 mutable bool m_called;
00314 
00315                         };

00326 #elif BOOST_PP_ITERATION_FLAGS() == 1
00327 
00328 #define LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS(z, n, data) const A##n *
00329 #define LUABIND_OPERATOR_PARAMS(z, n, data) const A##n & a##n

00332         template<class Ret BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_ITERATION()) BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), class A)>
00333         typename boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_void<Ret>
00334                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_void_caller<boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> >
00335                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_caller<Ret, boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> > >::type
00336         call_function(lua_State* L, const char* name BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_ITERATION()) BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_OPERATOR_PARAMS, _) )
00337         {
00338                 assert(name && "luabind::call_function() expects a function name");
00339                 typedef boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> tuple_t;
00340 #if BOOST_PP_ITERATION() == 0
00341                 tuple_t args;
00342 #else
00343                 tuple_t args(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), &a));
00344 #endif
00345                 typedef typename boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_void<Ret>
00346                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_void_caller<boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> >
00347                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_caller<Ret, boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> > >::type proxy_type;
00348 
00349                 lua_pushstring(L, name);
00350                 lua_gettable(L, LUA_GLOBALSINDEX);
00351 
00352                 return proxy_type(L, 1, &detail::pcall, args);
00353         }
00354 
00355         template<class Ret BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_ITERATION()) BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), class A)>
00356         typename boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_void<Ret>
00357                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_void_caller<boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> >
00358                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_caller<Ret, boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> > >::type
00359         call_function(luabind::object const& obj BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_ITERATION()) BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_OPERATOR_PARAMS, _) )
00360         {
00361                 typedef boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> tuple_t;
00362 #if BOOST_PP_ITERATION() == 0
00363                 tuple_t args;
00364 #else
00365                 tuple_t args(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), &a));
00366 #endif
00367                 typedef typename boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_void<Ret>
00368                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_void_caller<boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> >
00369                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_caller<Ret, boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> > >::type proxy_type;
00370 
00371                 obj.push(obj.interpreter());
00372                 return proxy_type(obj.interpreter(), 1, &detail::pcall, args);
00373         }

00418         template<class Ret BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_ITERATION()) BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), class A)>
00419         typename boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_void<Ret>
00420                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_void_caller<boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> >
00421                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_caller<Ret, boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> > >::type
00422         resume(lua_State* L BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_ITERATION()) BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_OPERATOR_PARAMS, _) )
00423         {
00424                 typedef boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> tuple_t;
00425 #if BOOST_PP_ITERATION() == 0
00426                 tuple_t args;
00427 #else
00428                 tuple_t args(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), &a));
00429 #endif
00430                 typedef typename boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_void<Ret>
00431                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_void_caller<boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> >
00432                         , luabind::detail::proxy_function_caller<Ret, boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> > >::type proxy_type;
00433 
00434                 return proxy_type(L, 0, &detail::resume_impl, args);
